document.discussion_title: Done deal | Argentinian forward Calleri joins West Ham on loan
document.topic_text: 11.08.2016 - 14:31 | Source: West Ham United Argentinian forward Calleri joins West Ham on loan Done deal West Ham have confirmed the signing of 22-year-old Jonathan Calleri . The Argentinian striker joins the Hammers on a season-long loan, arriving from Uruguayan side Maldonado . Slaven Bilic told whufc.com: "Unfortunately for him, but good for us, Argentina were knocked out of the Olympics this week, so he should be here with us pretty soon, depending on the work permit. "We did the deal a little while ago, and he is a top striker. You need a squad, of course, but it is all about the balance. I think we have a good balance." Calleri made three appearances for the Argentina Olympic team, scoring one against Algeria. He spent the first half of this year on loan with Sao Paulo , scoring nine goals in 12 Copa Libertadores matches. BREAKING: The Hammers have agreed a loan move for Argentinean striker @Jocalleri https://t.co/5eAjxX3K4B #WHUFC pic.twitter.com/FuVcZkhVgy
